text: White Christmas is a Christmas album by Al Green, first released in 1983. The album has been reissued under different titles, and sometimes with different sequencing. ==Track listing== #"White Christmas" #"The Christmas Song" #"Winter Wonderland" #"I'll Be Home for Christmas" #"Jingle Bells" #"What Christmas Means to Me" #"Oh Holy Night" #"Silent Night" #"It Feels Like Christmas" ==References== Category:1983 Christmas albums Category:Christmas albums by American artists Category:Al Green albums Category:Rhythm and blues Christmas albums Category:Gospel Christmas albums
title: White Christmas (Al Green album)
